backend/main.mo: Defines enums and types for clients, tasks, team members, and status categories along with comparison helpers for ordering.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React app and setting basic metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, public search routing, profile setup flow, and layout rendering.
Dialog form allowing users to create a new client with validation and enum‑based field selection.
frontend/src/components/AddTeamMemberDia: Dialog for adding team members with principal ID validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BulkEditClientsD: Dialog for bulk editing client fields like status, task category, and recurring options, applying updates via useUpdateClients.
frontend/src/components/BulkEditTasksDia: Dialog allowing bulk task updates including status, comments, task type, assignments, dates, billing, and payment fields with validation.
frontend/src/components/BulkImportDialog: Handles bulk importing clients from CSV or Excel, parsing fields, validating data, and previewing before submission.
frontend/src/components/BulkImportTasksD: Processes CSV or Excel task imports, validating task attributes and matching clients and team members before preview and upload.
frontend/src/components/BulkImportTeamMe: Imports team members from Excel by parsing rows, generating principals, validating entries, and submitting them in bulk.
frontend/src/components/ClientTable.tsx: Renders a client table with selection, bulk actions, and dialogs for editing, viewing tasks, adding tasks, and deleting clients. Manages client selection state and integrates admin permissions and delete mutations.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Provides a dialog to create a new task with fields for client, assignee, dates, billing, and comments. Handles validation, timestamp conversion, and submission via createTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/DueDateDetailMod: Displays a modal listing tasks due for a selected day type with sortable columns. Retrieves data via query hook and formats status, payment status, and dates.
frontend/src/components/EditClientDialog: Shows a dialog for editing client information including contact details, status, and categories. Syncs form state with client props and submits updates through updateClient mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Provides a dialog to edit an existing task with fields for status, dates, billing, and assignment. Converts timestamps, loads related data, and updates tasks via updateTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with a sidebar, navigation, page switching, and logout handling using user profile and admin status queries.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/public-search/Te: React table component that displays, sorts, selects, and exports team-member-assigned public tasks.
frontend/src/components/RevenueDetailMod: Displays sortable revenue details in a modal based on the selected revenue card type, using backend query data.
frontend/src/components/SearchableAssign: A searchable dropdown for selecting a team member, with filtering and selection logic.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Renders tasks in a sortable, filterable table with editing, commenting, bulk actions, and admin‑aware controls.
frontend/src/components/ViewClientTasksD: Modal that lists tasks for a specific client with status and type labels, using fetched task data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, public search, admin checks, and other data.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/excelTemplates.ts: Utility functions for parsing CSV, generating client/task import templates, and exporting task data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Displays client list with search, admin actions for adding and importing clients, and shows dialogs for creation and bulk import.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Aggregates client, task, team, and revenue data into dashboard cards with filters, task breakdowns, and export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a branded login screen enabling authentication via Internet Identity and navigation to public search.
frontend/src/pages/PublicSearchPage.tsx: Provides public searching of team members, clients, and tasks with debounced search, sorting, collapsible sections, and Excel export.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Displays filterable task lists with date search, bulk import, task creation, and Excel export options.
frontend/src/pages/TeamPage.tsx: Shows team member list with admin options to add or bulk‑import members and download a template.
frontend/src/pages/ToDoPage.tsx: React page for viewing, filtering, creating, editing, deleting, and exporting user to‑do items with dialogs and date handling.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility helpers for formatting dates and optional text values with placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and container settings for the app.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing UI redesign goals, feature requests, issues, and current app state for planning.
